reviewContent: The packaging was good and shipped quickly. The prices are very competitive specially because of the inclusion of free 135g box of nangrow 3. Also the expiry date is more than 8 months for all. Satisfied and will come back again to buy if the prices remain competitive.

Totally satisfied with the product. Received with free samples packs. Much cheaper than market. Delivery was really very quick.

The product is was packed and shipped instantly and received the very next day. Though the rates are bit higher then the market, but still u r getting genuine product very quickly at home. I am satisfied
